Text:
While visiting the ACH website, your visit will not be recorded and any personal information is not retained, other than the specific request to delete or correct one's information. 

​

Personal information:

Personal information is collected, processed, used, shared, or sold as described below:

​

Information Collected: 

Self-reported Information (i.e. name, home address, previous address, email address, demographic info)   

​

Source of Information Collected:

Processing Centers

Provided directly via direct communication

Data Compiling Companies

​

Purpose of Information Collected:

Data Marketing/ Marketing Services

Analysis

Online Targeting
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
The data collected from Personal Information is defined as any information concerning the personal or material circumstances of an identified or identifiable individual. Personal Information shall include but is not limited to: name, home address, home zip code, home telephone number, mobile phone number, or email address.

​

ACH does not collect sensitive data concerning a consumer, i.e. health data, political and philosophical beliefs, precise geolocation, racial/ ethnic data.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
